content.question: The annual preservation of the structure does which of the following?

choices.label: Engages all members of the community in a social activity
Promotes the spread of cultural ideals beyond the city
Creates the opportunity for ritualized gift exchange
Serves as the stimulus for trans-Saharan tourism

content.answer: Engages all members of the community in a social activity

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
